item.title: "Toe 2 Toe" Review: Chili Cheese Fries
item.description: THE CONTENDERS: Melter’s (Irving) melty burgers and loaded baked potatoes 14 year old native Dallas establishment 2 locations, downtown Dallas & Irving low key atmosphere with an emphasis on the food vs. Burger Fi (Garland) upscale burgers and hot dogs Florida chain with scores of locations around the country 50s/60s diner aesthetic thick, home-cut fries and real angus beef MELTERS Melters' chili cheese fries were the first and, so far, only thing I’ve had off of their menu, but I’m already impressed with the place.
